Text: President Trump has invoked the Insurrection Act of 1807 and deploying troops to handle this mess. That is why we hired him for the job... Big cojones!Thank you for prividing us with the proper protection and protection of our law enforcement 🙏🏻

Trump just had peaceful demonstrators viciously attacked.  No, Mr. President. This is not a dictatorship. This is the United States of America. Our citizens have a constitutional right to peacefully protest. It's called the First Amendment.
I guess if you've been hiding in the bunker walking to church surrounded by a platoon of armed guards is courage. Trump has lived his life graded on the curve.
